list.name: Python CLI Basic Example
list.description: Basic structure to create a command without passing the python command and the python file's path.

list.name: Python CLI with Typer + Rich Example
list.description: Interaction with an external API, to retrieve some currencies exchange rates, make conversion returning styled console output.

list.name: FastAPI Basic Example
list.description: Rest API that retrieves mock data using Faker library.

list.name: FastAPI Complete CRUD Example
list.description: Rest API that allows to create, read, update and delete employees and companies in the db, besides that, has endpoints to populate the db with Mock Data using faker.

list.name: FastAPI GraphQL
list.description: GraphQL API that retrieves fake companies using Faker library.

list.name: Stripe Integration with Node.js and TypeScript
list.description: This project offers a seamless Stripe integration with Node.js and TypeScript, providing a powerful API for managing basic operations like customer creation, checkout sessions, and portal sessions. It empowers developers to effortlessly handle payment-related tasks with the Stripe API.
